ClearPending.description: This action is used to clear the pending values.
ClearPending.longDescription: This action is used to clear the pending values of Manager.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ExportSystemConfiguration.description: This action is used to export System Configuration attributes.
ExportSystemConfiguration.longDescription: This action shall perform an export System Configuration attributes.

ExportUse.description: Type of Export intended for use :Default =0, Clone=1 , Replace=2.

IncludeInExport.description: Extra information to include in the export like     Default, Include read only, Include password hash values, Include read only and password hash values.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.Disabled: Ignoring of certificate warning is Disabled.
enumDescriptions.Enabled: Ignoring of certificate warning is Enabled.

ImportSystemConfiguration.description: This action is used to import System Configuration attributes.
ImportSystemConfiguration.longDescription: This action shall perform an import System Configuration attributes.

HostPowerState.description: Type of host power state after performing import operation.

ImportBuffer.description: Buffer content to perform Import. This is required for localstore only and not required for CIFS/NFS style Import.

ShutdownType.description: Type of shut down before performing import operation.

TimeToWait.description: The time to wait for the host to shut down. Default and minimum value is 300 seconds. Maximum value is 3600 seconds.

OemManager.description: OemManager contains properties of additional actions to complement the Manager DMTF schema.
OemManager.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent Oem Manager actions for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AttributeRegistry.description: The Resource ID of the Attribute Registry for the OEM Manager Attributes resource.
AttributeRegistry.longDescription: The reference to the Attribute Registry that lists the metadata describing the Oem Manager attribute settings in this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OemActions.description: The available actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

enumDescriptions.EnabledProxyDefault: Proxy Support to be Enabled and set to default.

enumDescriptions.HTTP: Proxy type is of HTTP type.
enumDescriptions.SOCKS4: Proxy type is of SOCKS4 type.

ResetToDefaults.description: This action is used to reset the Manager attributes to default.
ResetToDefaults.longDescription: This action shall perform a reset of the Manager attributes to their default values.

IPAddress.description: The IP address of the target export server.

Password.description: Password for the target export server.

ProxySupport.description: Proxy Support to be Enabled or Disabled.

ProxyType.description: Type of Proxy HTTP or SOCKS4.

ShareName.description: The directory path to the mount point.

ShareType.description: Type of share like  NFS, CIFS, HTTP, HTTPS, LOCAL

Target.description: To identify the component for Export. It identifies the one or more FQDDs .Selective list of FQDDs should be given in comma separated format . Default = ALL.

Username.description: User name for the target export server.

Workgroup.description: WorkGroup name if it is needed.

enumDescriptions.CIFS: Share type is of CIFS type.
enumDescriptions.HTTP: Share type is of HTTP type.
enumDescriptions.HTTPS: Share type is of HTTPS type.
enumDescriptions.LOCAL: Share type is of LOCAL type.
enumDescriptions.NFS: Share type is of NFS type.
